title: Pala
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a full vegan menu and a gluten free menu and each pizza is cooked and prepared in a dedicated area, pan and oven. Vegan topping options include cheeses, of which daiya is one, and a variety of veggies. Also has a small bar. Located near music venues and between the lower east side and the east village.
